alert.note: Alert for Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:04PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Juab... west central Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 503 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Clive to 13 miles southwest of Vernon. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grantsville, Dugway English Village, Vernon, Ophir, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Delle, Clive, Skull Valley, Tooele Army Depot South, Tooele Army Depot, Utah Test and Training Range South, Stockton, Rush Valley and Faust. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 52 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
